issue.title: [Java][Doc] JavaDoc errors while building the docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14512](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14512). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On JDK 11: https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/4037920463?check_suite_focus=true#step:8:4913

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14512?focusedCommentId=17526075) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
Hi `[~kszucs]` please could you help me if this error is related to what kind of documentations:
1. Arrow Java cookbook documentation -> <https://arrow.apache.org/cookbook/>
1. Arrow Java Documentation -> <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/java/index.html>
1. Arrow Java JavaDoc -> <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/java/reference/index.html>
   
   Please if you could help me with more details about the error, because run/errors was deleted base on retention settings.
   
    
   
   `[~lidavidm]` please if you have some details on your notes that matched with this ticket that could help me to understand more this task.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14512?focusedCommentId=17526077) by David Li (lidavidm):*
This is the regular JavaDoc. I don't recall what happened anymore. If you can't reproduce it then we can close it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14512?focusedCommentId=17526392) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
I cannot recall it either, too bad that GHA doesn't show the log anymore. 

Closing as not reproducible.
